verses.roman:
"more nā chuṅiha, prabhu, paḍoṅ tomāra pāya
eke nīca-jāti adhama, āra kaṇḍu-rasā gāya

synonyms: more—me; nā chuṅiha—please do not touch; prabhu—my Lord; paḍoṅ—I fall down; tomāra pāya—at Your feet; eke—on one side; nīca-jāti—of a low caste; adhama—the lowest of mankind; āra—and; kaṇḍu-rasā—a disease of wet, itching infections; gāya—on the body.
translation: "My Lord, please do not touch me. I fall at Your lotus feet. I am the lowest of men, having been born of a low caste. Besides that, I have infections on my body."
